annotation_method.description: Describe how the annotation is made (e.g. Manual, crYoLO, Positive Unlabeled Learning, template matching)

annotation_object.description: Metadata describing the object being annotated.

annotation_publications.description: List of publication IDs (EMPIAR, EMDB, DOI) that describe this annotation method. Comma separated.

annotation_software.description: Software used for generating this annotation

authors.description: Author of a scientific data entity.

confidence.description: Metadata describing the confidence of an annotation.

dates.description: A set of dates at which a data item was deposited, published and last modified.

files.description: File and sourcing data for an annotation. Represents an entry in annotation.sources.

ground_truth_status.description: Whether an annotation is considered ground truth, as determined by the annotator.

is_curator_recommended.description: This annotation is recommended by the curator to be preferred for this object type.

method_type.description: Classification of the annotation method based on supervision.

AnnotationConfidence.description: Metadata describing the confidence of an annotation.

ground_truth_used.description: Annotation filename used as ground truth for precision and recall

precision.description: Describe the confidence level of the annotation. Precision is defined as the % of annotation objects being true positive

recall.description: Describe the confidence level of the annotation. Recall is defined as the % of true positives being annotated correctly
